response.summary:
Industrial engineer with two years of experience on IT, core banking, data analyst, educator and leader.
Considerable speaking english skill level.

Ingeniero insutrial con cerca de dos años de experiencia en tecnologías de la información, nucleo bancario, análisis de datos, educador y líder.
Habilidad en inglés conversacional al 60%.

Eficiente en la solución de inconvenientes presentados y con habilitades de escucha activa al cliente, con herramientas y funciones para agilizar procesos de gestión de incidentes prioritarios y urgentes así como pruebas funcionales y procesos necesarios y repetitivos sobre las funcionalidades técnicas.
response.skills: GitHub, JIRA, XML, Análisis financiero, Contabilidad financiera, Habilidades sociales, PLSQL, Escucha activa, Gestión de proyectos, Java, MySQL, Python, Inglés, Trabajo creativo, Pruebas de Selenium, Análisis de datos, Notación para el Modelado de Procesos de Negocio (BPMN), R, PL/SQL

profile_positions.description:
- Ser consultor experto y líder referente en casos y peticiones críticos y urgentes.

profile_positions.title: Associate consultant

profile_positions.title: Técnico informático

company.name: Sophos Solutions
company.description:
We're a global company specializing in consulting, development, and implementation of IT solutions to support the modernization of the financial industry worldwide. With over 16 years of experience and deep expertise in the financial sector, we've been driving the transformation of banks and financial institutions in over 14 countries. Through our comprehensive advisory and end-to-end implementation services, we provide vendor-neutral solutions that enable banks, fintechs, insurers, brokerage firms, and companies across industries requiring financial services to modernize their core banking, migrate to the cloud, automate processes, enhance operational efficiency, and deliver a superior customer experience.

In addition to driving business and industry transformation, we also foster personal growth and development.

For two consecutive years, we've been recognized as one of the Best Places to Work in Latin America by GPTW, ranking #43 in 2022 and #23 in 2023. Furthermore, for the past 5 years, we've been part of GPTW's rankings in Colombia, achieving the #2 spot as the Best Places to Work in 2022.

At Sophos Solutions, we are equally dedicated to the success of our employees as we are to that of our clients.
